mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (title, brand, description, cost, idUser, idCategory, active) VALUES (#{title}, #{brand}, #{description}, #{cost}, #{user.id}, #{category.id}, #{active})
mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS id, p.title AS title, p.brand AS brand, p.description AS description, p.cost AS cost, p.active AS active, u.id AS userID, u.first_name AS userName, u.mid_name AS userMidname, u.last_name AS userLastname, u.email AS userEmail, u.date_of_birth AS userBirth, u.address AS userAddress, u.city AS userMidname, u.province AS userProvince, u.country AS userCountry, u.postal_code AS userPostalCode, u.password AS userPassword, u.id_role AS userRoleId, i.id AS imageID, i.name AS imageName, i.type AS imageType, i.url AS imageURL, i.cover AS cover, c.id AS categoryID, c.name AS categoryName FROM product p, user u, image i, category c WHERE p.idUser=u.id AND p.id=i.idProduct AND p.idCategory=c.id AND p.active=1

SELECT p.id AS id, p.title AS title, p.brand AS brand, p.description AS description, p.cost AS cost, p.active AS active, u.id AS userID, u.first_name AS userName, u.mid_name AS userMidname, u.last_name AS userLastname, u.email AS userEmail, u.date_of_birth AS userBirth, u.address AS userAddress, u.city AS userMidname, u.province AS userProvince, u.country AS userCountry, u.postal_code AS userPostalCode, u.password AS userPassword, u.id_role AS userRoleId, i.id AS imageID, i.name AS imageName, i.type AS imageType, i.url AS imageURL, c.id AS categoryID, c.name AS categoryName FROM product p, user u, image i, category c WHERE p.idUser=u.id AND p.idImage=i.id AND p.idCategory=c.id AND p.active=1 AND p.id = #{id}
SELECT c.id AS id, c.name AS name FROM category c
